content.raw:
I did not port that part.  I suppose to do that properly, we should create a `sandia_hand_gazebo` package that contains Gazebo launch files, at the same time it should depend on `sandia_hand_description` and Gazebo.

I should probably create a version of `spawn_model` from `gazebo_ros` that does not depend on `gazebo_msgs` for portability reasons.  Or equivalently, `gzfactory` that will fetch stuff from ROS param server or take a string input.
content.html:
I did not port that part. I suppose to do that properly, we should create a sandia_hand_gazebo package that contains Gazebo launch files, at the same time it should depend on sandia_hand_description and Gazebo.

I should probably create a version of spawn_model from gazebo_ros that does not depend on gazebo_msgs for portability reasons. Or equivalently, gzfactory that will fetch stuff from ROS param server or take a string input.
